ProductInfo.Features:
One year limited warranty. XPS 18 stand with adapter sold separately.
Windows 8, 64-bit, English XPS 18 3rd Generation Intel Core i5-3337U processor (3M Cache, up to 2.7 GHz)
8GB Dual Channel DDR3 1600MHz (4GBx2) 500GB 5400 rpm SATA Hard Drive, 32GB mSATA Solid State Drive
18.4 inch LED Backlit Touch Display with IPS/Truelife and FHD resolution (1920 X 1080), Intel HD Graphics 4000
Intel Centrino Wireless-N 2230 + Bluetooth 4.0 Integrated 5.1 with Waves MaxxAudio 4 Dell KM714 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse PowerCord 125V 1m C5
ProductInfo.Name: Dell XPS 18 portable Touch-Screen All-In-One Computer / i5-3337U / 8GB / 500GB Hard Drive + 32GB Solid State Drive
